mapper.select: SELECT a.*, p.professor_num, u1.name AS professor_name, s.student_num, u2.name AS student_name FROM advisor a JOIN professor p ON a.professor_id = p.id JOIN users u1 ON p.user_id = u1.id JOIN student s ON a.student_id = s.id JOIN users u2 ON s.user_id = u2.id
